attributes.title: Down right terrible
attributes.review: I can’t even open this app without crying🤬🤬😭 I cant believe why people even buy this app! It has a horrible format, confusing to get around, and just plain stupid! Ugh my iguana doesn’t even approve of this app, she says that it makes her gag! Whoever is in charge of this silly trick, I’m coming for you!

I want to go to his rally and already got the tickets but i cant go because i have to babysit my pet rock😖 hopefully next time i can go because i want him to feel my                L O V E  that i clearly have for him🥰 hes my favorite orange peel to ever be in office!!

attributes.title: major L
attributes.review: this app took forever to download and the main character has an overly orange skin tone. the game was okay but there was a side quest where you have to go traffic children:/ then once you finish the game you don't even get to unlock a better character. i hope the august 27th update will make this game better.

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I didn’t expect to see a giant orange. I didn’t know what to call it, but now I think I’ll call it a rapist. I really don’t know why anyone would support him. He’s quite literally a white supremest. If you still support him, you need to educate yourself. Donald Trump is a racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, Islamophobic, ableist, xenophobic, rapist and a fascist.

attributes.title: TRIED TO KILL ME?!?!  （＾_＾）
attributes.review: this is the worst app in the world. I almost threw up when i opened it. I think I’m allergic to Donald Trump 🤢 bc when I saw his face my life flashed before my eyes and I felt dizzy and felt like I was dying 😵😵😵 DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU WANT TO LIVE!! Anyways... this app also makes me very tired and sleepy and I think Donald Trump poisoned my eyes 👀 that’s all 🥰 have a nice day and like I said before...DONT DOWNLOAD!!😳😳😳😳😳😳

attributes.title: Danger to humankind. Deadly. Threat to existence
attributes.review: ZERO STARS. I can’t believe this disgrace of an app is allowed to exist. It promoted such a toxic lifestyle that 1984 is jealous. I can’t believe it. My grandma died 4 years ago because of this app. She time traveled and saw this app and died on sight. This app threatens the lives of everybody because the electronic waves coming out of the app cross into your brain and kills your brain cells.

attributes.title: Just bad
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took 12 hours to download and during those hours I couldn’t access anything on my phone . And when I finally got to access my apps it sent me straight to this one. This single app is causing my phone to run slower as well as glitch randomly.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!
attributes.review: This is the worst app EVER! It took forever to download and I have good WiFi I’m not broke. And when I opened the app it made my whole family have diarrhea and we couldn’t stop pooping for days bc there was a sound coming from it. When I shared the app with my friends they had flying cockroaches all over their house. I do not RECOMMEND!
